div.bibl: Svenska Kuriren, Mar. 18, 1911. THE VASA ORDER

body.p: The largest Swedish Sick benefit society in America, the Vasa Order, will hold its eighth Grand Lodge meeting at the La Salle Hotel march 21, to 24. About seventy-five delegates are expected to participate, coming from almost every state in the Union.
A banquet will be given for them next Tuesday. The Order has a membership of over fifteen thousand, from which two hundred lodges are set up.
